attributes.review: This app literally made me almost burn my house down!! It all started with when I downloaded it!!! It took DAYS to download and when it did, the smell of Cheeto puffs filled my nostrils!! Apparently flying squirrels HATE this smell and came flying through my window!!! At the time, my phone was lying on the stove, and the squirrels turned on the stove, trying to burn my phone!!! I quickly grabbed one of my room mates super hero capes and tried to put the fire out!! The cape because magic from the smoke and I suddenly started to fly around my house wearing that burning cape!!! Thankfully my hermit crab was home and helped me to put the fire out! My fingers are BURNING from typing out this review right now!! Who knew burnt phone screens stay super hot for a long while. I have to head to the ER, my fingertips just fell off. So PLEASE, if our value your life, DONâ€™T even THINK about downloading this app.
attributes.title: Almost burnt my house down!!!

attributes.review:
i downloaded this app to see how bad mr. trumpet was and i only got more reasons to hate him. i got so excited feeding my hatred towards him that i started levitating. when i was going back down to the floor i landed on my foot wrong, so i had to go to the ER. when i got to the ER they were telling me i had an ED (not eating disorder). I came home to Gordon Ramsey in the kitchen, and he was making a grilled cheese sandwich (iâ€™m vegan btw). Then, HE FED IT TO ME. After that I went to sleep, and dreamt about kissing Harry Styles. Then, I peed myself and my mom kicked me out of our house. So now I donâ€™t have a toilet anymore. HOW SADDD. Oh, and iâ€™m homeless. Then I decided to hitchhike to the white house. After many days of walking, my feet gave up
on me and I lost my ability to walk. HOW CRAZY. Now Iâ€™m sitting next to a frog waiting to be rescued by my one true love, Harry Styles. This is why you shouldnâ€™t get this app.

attributes.review: Hello, Iâ€™m a 23 year old woman with republican parents. Yes that is right, I have the right to vote. Well we were right side. We believed alm and not all cops are bad. We noticed trump had an app and downloaded it very quickly. When I opened it it asked for my number, so I put it in thinking Iâ€™d get reminders for rallies and news. Once I put my number in I kept getting texts saying â€œvote sleepy joe out trump 2020â€ non stop for a whole day. I thought it was weird but then the next day came around. When I opened the app there was a picture of Donald trump being spray tanned... nude... I was disgusted, I told my parent and they looked at me shocked and in denial. I showed them and my mother passed out hitting her head on the ground! So I came to write a review for the app noticing everyone else has been having very unspeakable problems with the app too. Now me and my family are VERY left sided and btw blm acabâ¤ï¸.
